phrases: Find the problem, find the solution.
Believe in the mission. Believe in the team.
Make it work for every possible scenario.
When faced with the greatest of pressures, remain calm.

homeIntro.title: Michael Odumosu
homeIntro.summary: Software developer with years of leadership experience. Constructed applications serving thouands of users in the financial and real estate industry. Managed core and external teams and mentored aspiring job seekers searching to enter the industry. Certified in GCP and AWS technologies.

projects.title: Facebook Mock Project
projects.desc: Created a Simple Mock Version of Facebook, with latest design UI/UX concepts

projects.title: Receipt Tracker
projects.desc: Uses webRTC and the Nanonets ML API to make an app that keeps records, and extracts price info from your receipts

projects.title: Social Uploader
projects.desc: Leverages modern auth to help content creators post once and see their work on all platforms

projects.title: Law for Learners Lawyer Website
projects.desc: Prototype template for an example homepage for a law firm based in NYC.

projects.desc: Smaller scaled reproduction of the meetup app, personally built based on the meetup app created within Windmillcode written with Flutter

projects.title: Mkimbe Online Store
projects.desc: Personal reproduction of an e-commerce app written in React

projects.title: Portfolio Website v1
projects.desc: v1 of my portfolio website contains downloadable version of my visual resume along with other features such as refernces and skills graph

projects.title: Ngrx Project
projects.desc: Full-featured angular application leveraging features such as angular material,ngrx,three.js,scss, i18n, responsiveness and server side pagination

projects.title: NYC Near Hackathon Proof of Vibes
projects.desc: Leveraging the near blockchain tech ecosystem to build an MVP SoFi application for the NEAR Hackathon

projects.title: Official Project Proof of Vibes
projects.desc: Social  Blockchain  Engineering Projects where users create NFT's souvenirs from events. Created with React, Firebase Auth, Firebase Realtime Database, NEAR Blockchain Technologies, SCSS,Material/UI, and Python

projects.title: NIBLS Coin Project
projects.desc: Sports Blockchain app based on a new sport whose financial identity (buying tickets,merch, media) will be based on the ethererum blockchain only. Created with Angular,Python MSSQL, Azure Cloud,Moralis blockchain API

projects.title: Baka Songs
projects.desc: Flutter Mobile app based on African music culture. Users can create, delete and favorite songs. Users can view entertainment news related to the industry. Users can optionally create an account with firebase and update their profile information. Also includes animations and ads.

projects.title: Ride Platform
projects.desc: Application built for local surfing store. Its a user-friendly online platform, seamlessly integrating an extensive collection of surf gear while prioritizing intuitive navigation and secure transaction processing, ensuring a hassle-free shopping experience for all surf enthusiasts.

projects.title: WaveRide
projects.desc: A community app for surfers and skaters. Users interact with it in several ways including communicating with other users, receiving alerts about cautions in the area, viewing events and locations and receiving the most update to news in their newsfeed

projects.title: Wave and Grind
projects.desc: Exclusive division of the WaveRide collection where surfers and skaters join a waitlist to wait for exclusive goods to drop. Once the items drop waitlist members typically have about 24 hours to access. Password to access is mercury

projects.title: Find My Role
projects.desc: AI powered resume app where users can upload a resume and JD and receive best tips on what to talk about during a potential interview

projects.title: Zawadi ya Manukato
projects.desc: Restaurant application where users can place orders for food to the restaurant and have food prepared for them (in progress)

projects.title: Eneobia
projects.desc: Video Management Platform App where users can transfer, upload, and download videos between their computer and multple video platform apps. View on desktop only mobile coming soon
